price: (100) For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
